item.title: Trying out Intel's Neural Compute Stick
item.description: Movidius and Intel Neural Compute Stick 2 The new, improved Intel® Neural Compute Stick 2 (Intel® NCS 2) features Intel’s latest high-performance vision processing unit: the Intel® Movidius™ Myriad™ X VPU. With more compute cores and a dedicated hardware accelerator for deep neural network inference, the Intel® NCS 2 delivers up to eight times the performance boost compared to the previous generation Intel® Movidius™ Neural Compute Stick (NCS). — Intel
